attributes.title: I got glitches because of this app
attributes.review:
I got this app to get updates for our president but my phone started to glitch. This app is terrible!!! It so bad I think the trump team won’t be able to fix the glitches and they should delete it! I don’t want what happened to me to the rest of the users! WARNING DO NOT DOWNLOAD APP! YOUR PHONE WILL GET GLITCHES! I try to disable notifications but they still sent me alerts! I HAD TO GO TO THE STORE TO GET NEW PHONE BECAUSE OF THIS!!! All I wanted was to get updates for TRUMP 2020 election but sadly I got glitches and a poorly organized app! I would strongly advise trump supporters to not risk to cost of getting this app!

-Karan

attributes.title: HACKED do NOT use
attributes.review: I was excited to find this app since I heard from some friends that it was helpful on ways to support our president in the upcoming Election. I was however sincerely dissapointed. The app became a complete mess after I finished making my profile. It gave me notifications on his tweets and events nonstop. Some of them weren’t even real?? I couldn’t keep up. To me it looks like someone has hacked into his app to discourage voters!! Now they have so much of my information from my profile! I’m worried on how the hackers will attack me next. To my fellow trumpets, we can succeed but not with this app. Keep on fighting🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Horrible app with viruses
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and had used it but one day everything started to show up in Russian, there was one particular Russian statement that stood out, I put it in a translator which then said “ we hacked you, just like we hack everything else for trump”. I was shocked and immediately deleted the app, my phone then notified me my phone had a virus. I suggest NOT DOWNLOADING this app. I have also stopped supporting trump and became a democrat.     👁👅👁

attributes.title: Horrible, might have to sue
attributes.review: At first I love the app. So useful and it really made me feel more connected to the MAGA fan base. However, after about 2hr of having it, my phone randomly started playing Cardi B. The music was so traumatizing and made my ears start bleeding, like literal blood dripping out my ears, then my dog started to cry and ran away to get away from that trash music. I legit smashed my phone with a mallet for it to stop.  My mom started freaking out and I had to go to the hospital. Not only did this app allow for my phone to be hacked, my parents have outrages medical bill and a new phone to pay for. Don’t get the app. 🐿

attributes.title: Trump 2020 out of the office
attributes.review: Horrible President. Horrible person. He is a rapist and a racist he doesn’t support Black Lives Matter he should be at the office no one likes him he is a disgrace to this country he’s not doing anything about the kids in cages he does nothing him and all his family should leave the office he wants to have sex with his daughter if she was 10 years older his son is fearing for his life he has no social media he has nothing to contact with the outside world Trump is probably keeping him hostage no one likes him he should be banned from the country horrible person horrible president deserves no rights.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: THIS APP WILL TAKE OVER YOUR PHONE!!!!! The only apps I can visit are messages to receive the messages the app sends me, App Store, but I can’t visit anything other than this page, or the app itself!! It drained my battery in 1 minute if I go anywhere else! I’ve tried to get Apple to do it but they said there is nothing they can do. It has taken over my fridge screen as well, all the TVs in my house, and all other electronics. It’s stared spreading to friends technology and family as well. I wish I could delete it. Do not get this app at all unless you wish to be forever haunted by the trump 2020 app.

attributes.title: I HATE THIS APP
attributes.review: We already know that Donald Trump is a piece of crap but now he is trying to silence generation z by deleting our only platform to speak out about our opinions on. A decent human being wouldn't be a baby and a poor sport about it but they would actually be happy that we are using our resources to speak out, and instead of trying to shut us up, they would try and see our needs and understand how we see you and try to change that. But no we already know that your a piece of crap who only cares about the lives of rich white men. TRY AND DELETE TIK TOK AND WE WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE... also #savebarrontrump

attributes.title: disgusting app
attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

attributes.title: I am flabbergasted
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to go with my shrine of the bunker boy😍 this is the only thing I can afford to get (the shrine is still a work in progress 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩) after 10 minutes everything starts to go wrong! All of a sudden my hands start to fill with Cheeto dust and I open the app to see what’s up and there it is! The photo of my one and only getting a spray tan naKED? Next thing I know the app crashes and everything goes dark only to be introduced to my new one and only,,,, there he is,,, dressed in dark clothing computer and all handsome mask,,, I was, swept off of my feet..... There he was... anonymous 😍
